steps.name: Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/
Disable cookies
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Recip-PVgQq@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Recip-PVgQq
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the email message is correct
Verify that the recipient's first name in the email is AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Recip-PVgQq
Verify that the recipient's last name in the email is 08114
Verify that the custom msg in the email is BgruodRboT
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Send-PVgQq
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/organization/invite?token=190079e1cfe0ad164509b71663a2b2a2f1f96a66ua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Send-PVgQq 35576
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Send-PVgQq
Click "Accept"
Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Send-PVgQq 35576
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-OHhuJ-750-U-Recip-PVgQq 08114
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
